NAME key
DLG 2

DLG 0
It says that this is the 42nd kilometre. I have no idea from where, or where it's headed.I've just always liked walking here. I come here to clear my mind, gather my thoughts, and be somewhere quiet.I seem to be needing this more and more these days.
NAME first signpost

DLG 1
You found a nice warm cup of tea
NAME tea dialog

DLG 2
A key! {wvy}What does it open?{wvy}
NAME key dialog

DLG 3
The baby is sleeping.I remember when my son was born.It was a mixture of utter horror and utter exhilaration.I wanted to cry and laugh at the same time. I think I did just that.
NAME stroller dialog

VAR a
42
